data.name: Istanbul: Digital Edition
data.detailed_description:
The official digital adaptation of one of the best board games in history â€“ Istanbul.

Istanbul is, without a doubt, one of the best board games to have ever been published. The long list of awards and honors speaks for itself:

ğŸ† 2015 Nederlandse Spellenprijs Best Expert Game Nominee
ğŸ† 2014 Swiss Gamers Award Winner
ğŸ† 2014 Meeples' Choice Nominee
ğŸ† 2014 Kennerspiel des Jahres Winner
ğŸ† 2014 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee
ğŸ† 2014 Gra Roku Nominee
ğŸ† 2014 Gouden Ludo Winner
ğŸ† 2014 Golden Geek Board Game of the Year Nominee
ğŸ† 2014 Golden Geek Best Strategy Board Game Nominee
ğŸ†2014 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee

In our 2018 digital version we have maintained all of the features that made Istanbul the fan favorite that it is, but also expanded upon it with a number of tools and features only available on the digital platform. We maintained the authentic board game feeling with the convenience you can expect from an electronic device.

So what is the game about?

Can you be the first merchant to collect a certain number of rubies?

In Istanbul, you lead a group of one merchant and his four assistants through 16 locations in the bazaar. In each such location, you can carry out a specific action. The challenge, however, is that to take action, you must move your merchant and an assistant there, then leave the assistant behind to handle all the details while you focus on larger matters. If you want to use that assistant again later, your merchant must return to that location to pick him up. Thus, you must plan ahead carefully to avoid being left with no assistants and thus unable to do anythingâ€¦

What can you expect?

Features:

â€¢ Adaptation of TOP 100 board games of all time by BGG ranking
â€¢ Play with AI, with friends or with both
â€¢ Great artwork by Andreas Resch
â€¢ Languages: English, German, Dutch, Polish, French, Korean, Japanese, Chinese Simplified, Spanish
â€¢ Pass and play mode
â€¢ Cross platform online multiplayer with synchronous and asynchronous modes
â€¢ Opponents' last moves replay
â€¢ 3 levels of difficulty AIs with individual strategies
â€¢ Preset or randomly generated game boards
â€¢ Atmospheric music and sounds
â€¢ Unique, original board game experience
â€¢ Intuitive gameplay
â€¢ Colorblind mode
â€¢ Over 70 achievements

What are you waiting for? Become the best merchant in Istanbul!

  • Storage: 650 MB available space
